job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Systems Engineering, Management Information Systems, Project Management or Finance/Business

jd: From: Jitendra Chauhan, GVR Infotek jitendra.chauhan@gvrinfotek.com Reply to: jitendra.chauhan@gvrinfotek.com Job Description -Submit candidates with their DL, Visa Copy, LinkedIn. RTR in the favor of GVR Infotek Project ManagerClient: Virginia Department of TransportationLocation: Richmond, VA – Hybrid Duration: 6+ monthsGC/USC/H4 onlyInterview Process: In Person Only Need local candidates only with address proof Note:Need PMP Cert with copy Prior Govt client experience is plus Job Description:The Project Manager is responsible for the outcome of the assigned projects. The Project Manager leads the team through the Commonwealth Standard for Project Management for successful completion of the project phases:PreselectInitiationPlanningExecution and ControlCloseoutResponsibilities:Manage and deliver complex IT Project(s) with multiple teams and work streams coordinated to an aggressive delivery schedule.Serve as a hands-on technical project manager with development staff and business groupsCoordinate and communicate with Information Technology Division management and staff to coordinate work staff and resourcing.Communicate timelines and expectations to technical and business staffFacilitate multi-functional technical team collaboration.Collaborate with vendors, consultants, and contractors in the execution of projects, including contract management, and work with procurement office(s).Adhere to project management practices and governance requirements.Coordinate with project management offices.Maintain project budget, plans, tasks, schedules, risks, and status and disseminate information to team members and customers as defined in the communication plan.Ensure documentation of requirements and use cases, facilitate design workshops for assigned project.Ensure preparation of test objectives, test plans and test cases for assigned project.Provide the management of project milestones and deliverables for on-time and on-budget delivery.Define, measure, and clearly communicate progress with project metrics.Support system and application training efforts.Required Skills:8 Years - Experience managing large MultiStream projects valued at $10M or greater each8 Years - Experience in IT infrastructure delivery (Networking, physical plant, vendor management, site provisioning)PMP Certification8 Years - Experience in both Scaled Agile and Waterfall Project Management8 Years - Microsoft Office Products (Word, Excel, Access, Outlook, Visio, PowerPoint, Project Server)8 Years - Experience managing projects with high visibility and high stakes8 Years - Experience managing projects that had to coordinate with at least one external team.8 Years - Experience managing a project as part of a larger program and under PMO governance.4 Years - Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Systems Engineering, Management Information Systems, Project Management or Finance/Business Desired Skills:VITA CertificationAgile Scrum Master CertificationSAFe® Scrum Master Certification Thanks & Regards,Jitendra ChauhanTechnical Recruiter | GVR Infotek LLCEmail : jitendra.chauhan@gvrinfotek.comAd:13573 Tabasco Cat Trail, Frisco, TX 75035W: www.gvrinfotek.com
